title: ProtonDrive

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of your proton account

password.title: Password
password.description: The password of your proton account

mailbox_password.title: Mailbox Password
mailbox_password.description: The mailbox password of your two-password proton account (see https://proton.me/support/the-difference-between-the-mailbox-password-and-login-password)

2fa.title: 2FA Code
2fa.description: The 2FA code of your proton drive account if set up with two-factor authentication

otp_secret_key.title: OTP Secret Key
otp_secret_key.description: The OTP secret key of your proton drive account if set up with two-factor authentication

original_file_size.title: Original File Size
original_file_size.description: Return the file size before encryption

replace_existing_draft.title: Replace Existing Draft
replace_existing_draft.description: Create a new revision when filename conflict is detected. Required for integration tests

enable_caching.title: Enable Caching
enable_caching.description: Caches files and folders metadata to reduce API calls. Not recommended for VFS mounts

$comment: ProtonDrive is end-to-end encrypted. No multi-threading support due to block encryption
